Summary: Bright light traveling in straight line from west to east.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around July 26th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailssitting on my front porch with my wife. a light came over the house way up in the sky. at first i thought it was a jet, but then i realized there was no sound, it was too bright and there were no red\green lights. if it had been a jet, i would have heard some sound due to the speed it was moving would have had some type of jet noise. the thing that really made me notice was that it was so bright, brighter and whiter than any other aircraft i had ever seen in the area. i listened for any sound of engines and looked for the typical navigation lights usually seen on aircraft. however this had no sound and no nav lights. i watched as this made a straight path towards the east. i took a picture with my crappy iphone and it showed up on the image. i watched until the light turned off (?) and disappeared. if this were an aircraft, there should have been nav lights , but there was nothing.
